title:Pandapaxxy's Vault of Glass Weapon Refresh Breakdown
description:Based on https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/1j4yb1w/vault_of_glass_weapon_refresh_breakdown/

// Fatebringer
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "Fatebringer is finally craftable. Did I slog my butt off in a master VoG trying to get this? No I cheesed the heck out of Templar and Atheon, but I don't doubt it was hard doing a full run. I just wanted my Timelost flashlight gun. Not too much has changed with this version other than Kinetic Tremor and Magnificent Howl being notable additions. If you really need a kinetic hand cannon with Magnificent Howl, then farm out the normal version and craft it. I wouldn't go for the Timelost unless you really want to flex your loot." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pve,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=4184168210&perks=1840239774,1087426260,3418782618,4104185692

// Fatebringer (Timelost)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "Fatebringer is finally craftable. Did I slog my butt off in a master VoG trying to get this? No I cheesed the heck out of Templar and Atheon, but I don't doubt it was hard doing a full run. I just wanted my Timelost flashlight gun. Not too much has changed with this version other than Kinetic Tremor and Magnificent Howl being notable additions. If you really need a kinetic hand cannon with Magnificent Howl, then farm out the normal version and craft it. I wouldn't go for the Timelost unless you really want to flex your loot." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pve,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=4219826183&perks=1840239774,1087426260,3418782618,4104185692

// Fatebringer
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "Fatebringer was never really anyone's first choice. The model is just too obstructive. However the perks more than made up for the flashlight. Eye of the Storm and Explosive Payload in its prime was a force to be reckoned with. Fatebringer shot easy so it didn't take much other than a weird strafe to miss a target, but with the updated perks Keep Away and Magnificent Howl both make solid options. Add in that Fatebringer is craftable and you're golden!" Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=4184168210&perks=3250034553,3142289711,47981717,699525795

// Fatebringer (Timelost)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "Fatebringer was never really anyone's first choice. The model is just too obstructive. However the perks more than made up for the flashlight. Eye of the Storm and Explosive Payload in its prime was a force to be reckoned with. Fatebringer shot easy so it didn't take much other than a weird strafe to miss a target, but with the updated perks Keep Away and Magnificent Howl both make solid options. Add in that Fatebringer is craftable and you're golden!" Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=4219826183&perks=3250034553,3142289711,47981717,699525795
dimwishlist:item=4219826183&perks=3250034553,3142289711,47981717,2720533289

// Praedyth's Revenge
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "Bumping your handling to 100 is easy with our newest Rapid-fire frame sniper. Fluted Barrel, a Handling MW and the Tactical mod bring you to over 100. Enhanced Kinetic Tremors can allow you to relive the glory days of rapid-fire snipers and two shot body again. Opening Shot will help make sure you don't have to body shot to kill." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller

// Found Verdict
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "The Origin Trait Timelost Magazine paired with Rewind Rounds will let you fire for nearly the full 20 seconds after your super ends before reloading. If your ammo keeps up that long. It was one of the few things holding Aggressive Frame shotguns back over Rapid-Fire shotguns was their magazine size limiting them. This was before the Grave Robber buff, but they still fell behind. If you prefer your already strong shotgun to do even more damage then opt for Trench Barrel." Recommended MW: Reload Speed.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Found Verdict (Timelost)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "The Origin Trait Timelost Magazine paired with Rewind Rounds will let you fire for nearly the full 20 seconds after your super ends before reloading. If your ammo keeps up that long. It was one of the few things holding Aggressive Frame shotguns back over Rapid-Fire shotguns was their magazine size limiting them. This was before the Grave Robber buff, but they still fell behind. If you prefer your already strong shotgun to do even more damage then opt for Trench Barrel." Recommended MW: Reload Speed.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Found Verdict
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "One of a few shotguns that competed with Matador 64 back in the day. Now we have Compass Rose, Someday, Imperial Decree, Deadlock, Scavenger’s Fate, or A Sudden Death. All of them are great and you'll see the almost boring combo of Threat Detector and Opening Shot. If you want to smooth brain and slide everywhere, Slideshot is a valid option…" Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller

//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "When I heard that Vision of Confluence was getting a refresh I was hoping it would get something unique like Doom of Chelchis and it does! I was pleasantly surprised by this one particular refresh." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Vision of Confluence (Timelost)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "When I heard that Vision of Confluence was getting a refresh I was hoping it would get something unique like Doom of Chelchis and it does! Incandescent and Firefly together for double booms. You also get Heal Clip, in the same column as Incandescent (boo) but that means you can pair it with Frenzy for even faster reloads. I was pleasantly surprised by this one particular refresh." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Vision of Confluence
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "When talking or taking Vision of Confluence into PvP you really have limited options. You have a pretty slow 1.00s TtK with 3c1b on all but T0 resilience. Zen Moment will help you keep your bullets where they need to go and Explosive Payload will make it harder for your enemies to fight back. Kill Clip allows you to drop a shot and go for 3c on all resiliences except T5 and below instead going for 2c1b. Definitely easier for kill chaining." Recommended MW: Stability.|tags:pvp,controller

// Vision of Confluence (Timelost)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "When talking or taking Vision of Confluence into PvP you really have limited options. You have a pretty slow 1.00s TtK with 3c1b on all but T0 resilience. Zen Moment will help you keep your bullets where they need to go and Explosive Payload will make it harder for your enemies to fight back. Kill Clip allows you to drop a shot and go for 3c on all resiliences except T5 and below instead going for 2c1b. Definitely easier for kill chaining." Recommended MW: Stability.|tags:pvp,controller

// Vision of Confluence
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "When talking or taking Vision of Confluence into PvP you really have limited options. You have a pretty slow 1.00s TtK with 3c1b on all but T0 resilience. Zen Moment will help you keep your bullets where they need to go and Explosive Payload will make it harder for your enemies to fight back. Kill Clip allows you to drop a shot and go for 3c on all resiliences except T5 and below instead going for 2c1b. Definitely easier for kill chaining." Recommended MW: Handling.|tags:pvp,mkb

// Corrective Measure
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "~~Honestly, did we need another void adaptive machine gun? Bungie, you couldn't have made this Stasis or Strand to give some love to them? Commemoration got a refresh and is craftable. Hammerhead released with Into the Light. Corrective Measure was first, yes.~~ But that's now so many Void ~~adaptive~~ frame machine guns. Withering Gaze does top the list as being unique, but Killing Tally and Rewind Rounds will probably be what most players use. I have been corrected. It's now an aggressive frame. Slightly unique but not enough for me. Should have been a different element." Recommended MW: Reload Speed.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Hezen Vengeance
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "Thankfully Bungie didn't dilute the pool too much with this rocket. Enhanced Overflow allows for 3 rockets which is just absurd considering you can then walk over a brick of special or heavy and get another 3 shots. That's your whole Explosive Light stack if not enhanced. It requires some setup and luck, sure. But damn if that won't be satisfying. Incandescent in the third column also allows the booms to be even bigger." Recommended MW: Blast Radius.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Hezen Vengeance (Timelost)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "Thankfully Bungie didn't dilute the pool too much with this rocket. Enhanced Overflow allows for 3 rockets which is just absurd considering you can then walk over a brick of special or heavy and get another 3 shots. That's your whole Explosive Light stack if not enhanced. It requires some setup and luck, sure. But damn if that won't be satisfying. Incandescent in the third column also allows the booms to be even bigger." Recommended MW: Blast Radius.|tags:pve,mkb,controller

// Hezen Vengeance
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "I wouldn't put the Aggressive Frame rocket launchers into a list of viable weapons for PvP. They fire quickly but just feel clunky with the low handling. Impulse Amplifier will help the already quick rocket hit its target and Explosive Light will bring your blast radius up to 100. Unfortunately Cluster Bomb and Incandescent are in the third column so you can't pair them with Impulse Amplifier." Recommended MW: Blast Radius.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller
dimwishlist:item=2265407516&perks=3525010810,2822142346,951095735,3194351027

//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB / Controller): "I wouldn't put the Aggressive Frame rocket launchers into a list of viable weapons for PvP. They fire quickly but just feel clunky with the low handling. Impulse Amplifier will help the already quick rocket hit its target and Explosive Light will bring your blast radius up to 100. Unfortunately Cluster Bomb and Incandescent are in the third column so you can't pair them with Impulse Amplifier." Recommended MW: Blast Radius.|tags:pvp,mkb,controller
